org.apache.twill.kafka.client

Interface KafkaClientService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KafkaClient, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public interface KafkaClientService
extends KafkaClient, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    A KafkaClient that extends Service to provide lifecycle management.
